00008 string sqlSafe(string str) {
00009         string r = "";
00010         for(int i = 0; i < str.length(); ++i) {
00011                 if(str[i] == '\\') r += "\\\\";
00012                 else if(str[i] == '\'') r += "''";
00013                 else if(str[i] == '\n') r += "\\n";
00014                 else if(str[i] == '\t') r += "\\t";
00015                 else r += str[i];
00016         }
00017         return string("'") + r + "'";
00018 }
00019 
00020 string sqlSafe(bool b) {
00021         if(b) return "1";
00022         return "0";
00023 }
